## jQuery support

The _Retroweb_ theme adds [jQuery][jquery] support. To avoid cross-site
includes - which would require user consent due to the European GDPR - a
'frozen' version of jQuery is shipped with the [_Retroweb_][rwe] extension.
Currently jQuery `3.6.0` is included (see [here][assets]).


[jquery]: https://jquery.com
[rwe]: https://github.com/retostauffer/retroweb-ext
[assets]: https://github.com/retostauffer/retroweb-ext/tree/main/assets
